title: ADi pADi dinam
sahitya:
(rAgA:  Anandabhairavi)   


anupallavi



ADi pADi dinam.  rAgamAlikA.  Adi tALA.  
1:  ADi pADi dinam alaindirundAl engaL Ayar pADiyinil Anandam tAn kaNNan
cADi aravu mIdADik-kaLittAn kunru gOkularkkuk-kuDaiyAip-piDittAn kaNNan
 caraNam 2  (rAgA:  mOhana)Aa:S R2 G3 P D2 S  Av:  S D2 P G3 R2 S  mOhanamAi muruval izhaiyum mukham Ayar kula bAlan tan vAyil kuzhal
nAdam pozhiyum iha ninaivazhikkum anda mAyavan emmanam malarndiDavE
 caraNam 3  (rAgA:  sAmA) Aa:S R2 M1 P D2 S  Av:  S D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  vAri vAri maNNait-tUvinAlum (avan) (inda) pArinil avaniyilum iniyavan uNDO?
kaNNai imaikkumun ODi uri aDittu veNNai attanaiyum vizhungiya mAyan
 caraNam 4  (rAgA:  sindhubhairavi)Aa:S R2 G2 M1 G2 P D1 N2 S  Av:  N2 D1 P M1 G2 R1 S N2 S  tavap-payanO enda janma puNNiyamO mAyavan emmiDai vaLarndAn
ulagOr uyarndOr tozhudEttum yAdavan (yAdava) tilakamenat-tigazh mAdhavan emmiDai
